ptxt.intxrefpoff: Manual Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting:Diesel Engine Model

s1.ptxt: Remove clutch operating cylinder assembly from transmission front case referring to Clutch Operating Cylinder Assembly Removal and Installation
Remove reverse idle gear case (1) from rear case (2).
Remove back up light switch (1), washer and pin from front case (2).
Remove select return bolts (3), springs and guide pins, and then remove adapter case (1) from rear case (2).
Drive out each gear shift yoke pin (3) using special tool and then remove each gear shift yoke (1) and gear shift & select lever assembly (2).
Drive out reverse shift limit cam pin (3) using special tool and then remove reverse shift limit cam (1) and spring (2).
Remove rear bearing plate (1), oil gutter (2) and reverse shift shaft (3) from rear case (4).
Remove rear main shaft circlip (1) from rear case (3) using snap ring pliers (2).
Remove locating bolts (1) from rear case (2), then take out locating springs and balls.
Remove front case bolts (1), then separate rear case (2) from front case (3) using special tool.
Drive out each gear shift shaft pin using special tool and then remove each gear shift shaft (1), fork (2), ball and inter lock pin.
Remove input shaft bearing retainer bolt (1), then separate input shaft bearing retainer (2) from front case (3).
Remove oil seal (1) from input shaft bearing retainer (2) using flat end rod or the like, if necessary.
Remove input shaft front bearing circlip (1) from front case (3) using snap ring pliers (2).
Remove input shaft assembly, main shaft assembly (1) and countershaft assembly (2) all together from front case (3) tapping input shaft end by plastic hammer lightly.
